amendment.description: Amendment amends section 221 of Title II regarding rehabilitation hospitals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to amend title II, section 221, by inserting a new section.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. LoBiondo.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
